reviews.review_msg: ONE OF THE BEST PROFS EVER. Extremely caring for her students and lots of fun in class. Go take her class and enjoy your semester.
She is the best prof I have ever met in SFU. She explains everything clear, and loves to interact with student. Good prof!
Best professor I had in my experience as a SFU student. Take her classes at any opportunity.
He has a good sense of humour and teaches with effort. However, he's too strict on hiragana and katakana writings.

She thinks she is a senior in teaching so she does not need to follow what the departments says. She only uses a textbook that she edited on her own(useless compared to the actual course book). Her syllabus is a mess and changes often. Finals are ext. hard and tests on dumb stuff (ie what is Tokyo's temp. on May?) Take her class, waste $ and time.

Furukawa Sensei is really nice and caring towards her students. She teaches Japanese with passion and responds nicely to students' questions about Japanese in general. She quickly responds to emails and is generous in her marking scheme. I would love to take upper Japanese courses with her again in the future.
